rev.desc.rev.desc: After upgraded to SM9.41, there are a lot of errors in bg monitor log, and we need to identify the rootcause.
Parse correct params when calling dbdict.helper function in start.loop panel
When calling select panel, RTE doesn't support sort by/group by Array/Structure fields any more, filter these kinds fields out when calling select
fix globallist does not support string type message id issue.
recompile only
Panel file.set.1
Added expression to cleanup the $L.msg.values variable.
Added panels before file.set and file.set.app to check if the globallist has changed since it was selected and refresh it if it has.
Now passes in gloallist file variable to a specified app so that the app may fill in display.list and value.list.
Panel file.set
Added str() to these two expressions
display.list in $L.file=str($L.senddisplay)
value.list in $L.file=str($L.sendlist)
Updated to localize user defined globallists

I have set it so that if it fails the first update and exits through the regular error exit (it was process.err.msg.1), it will set up a query, reselect the global list, and update the global list setting the display and value lists to {}.
SCR33587 Task30711
The process.err.msg.1 now exits to the next panel instead of the next.proceed panel to ensure that the erroneous record is getting unlocked.
Added call panel to handle the globallists that have an application specified...modified decide.proceed, added new panel called call.app
Modified app to continue processing after an error's been reached and ensure that filename isn't null when calling fillcombo.
Changed "LIST:"+name in $L.dbdict. to "LIST:"+name in $L.file on panel unlock.exit in panel apm.server.initer.

descript.descript: After upgraded to SM9.41, there are a lot of errors in bg monitor log, and we need to identify the rootcause.
Parse correct params when calling dbdict.helper function in start.loop panel
When calling select panel, RTE doesn't support sort by/group by Array/Structure fields any more, filter these kinds fields out when calling select
fix globallist does not support string type message id issue.
recompile only
Panel file.set.1
Added expression to cleanup the $L.msg.values variable.
Added panels before file.set and file.set.app to check if the globallist has changed since it was selected and refresh it if it has.
Now passes in gloallist file variable to a specified app so that the app may fill in display.list and value.list.
Panel file.set
Added str() to these two expressions
display.list in $L.file=str($L.senddisplay)
value.list in $L.file=str($L.sendlist)
Updated to localize user defined globallists

I have set it so that if it fails the first update and exits through the regular error exit (it was process.err.msg.1), it will set up a query, reselect the global list, and update the global list setting the display and value lists to {}.
SCR33587 Task30711
The process.err.msg.1 now exits to the next panel instead of the next.proceed panel to ensure that the erroneous record is getting unlocked.
Added call panel to handle the globallists that have an application specified...modified decide.proceed, added new panel called call.app
Modified app to continue processing after an error's been reached and ensure that filename isn't null when calling fillcombo.
Changed "LIST:"+name in $L.dbdict. to "LIST:"+name in $L.file on panel unlock.exit in panel apm.server.initer.
